message: Let's split it 50/50, no need for negotiations!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
No way, I'm not giving you 7/10 of the money! I'll propose a new deal.
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
You're not getting more, Bob! I'll try to take a bigger share.
I'm taking a firmer stance, Bob. This is my best offer.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm not desperate, Bob. I'll make a final push for a better deal.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't expect mercy!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll make one last stand.
I'm taking what I can get, Bob. This is my last offer.
You're getting close to nothing, Alice. Don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll make one last-ditch effort.
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You're out of options, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but you're not getting any more!
Fine, Bob. You win. I'll get nothing.
